metadata.titel_preek: I Am The Bread Of Life

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The search for spiritual nourishment and identity in a world of 'junk diets' (greed, success, drugs), where Christ offers Himself as the essential substance for life and meaning.

tekstueel_bewijs: I am the Bread of Life
children of so discerning and gracious a heavenly father
He addresses us that way because we are hungering people
we are the children of God
New Testament people were never in doubt

tegenstander.identificatie: The 'Junk Diets' of Secularism (Greed, Success, Drugs, Self-Limitation)
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is framed largely as cultural seduction and personal insufficiency rather than a cosmic/demonic power.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The preacher's own struggle with performance and the 'failure' of homiletics.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Preacher
secundair_narratief_programma.object: The 'best' sermon/perfect utterance of the gospel
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The preacher's failure serves as a parable for the human inability to satisfy the 'primal hunger' through human effort.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.zender_naar_ontvanger: Heavenly Father → Bread of Life → Hungering People
actantieel_schema_visualisatie.helper_subject_tegenstander: Early Church Witness → Jesus (I AM) ← Secular Greed/Junk Diets

voorbeelden_mens_subject: we will never be what we meant to be

voorbeelden: people so tempted ought to repeat
wanting, longing for some sense of relatedness
searching about for some way to put their hands... upon an explanation
we are able to make all kinds of substitutions

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is primarily 'Recruitment' oriented, focusing on the deep desires (longing) of the hearer and redirecting them from 'junk' to 'bread'.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From ~S1 (Junk Diets) to S2 (The realization of nakedness/failure) to S1 (Christ as the only I AM).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in the 'I AM' claim of Christ which provides an ontological ground that human effort cannot reach.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Moderate; death is mentioned as the 'rigor' that snatches prizes, but the focus is more on the 'emptiness' of life without meaning.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While there is significant focus on human failure, the 'engine' is theocentric. Christ is the Subject of the primary provision (Bread), and human effort is explicitly described as 'grunts and groans'.

indicatoren_moralisme.indicator: Focus on human greed as the primary problem
indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: I grieve that this great nation has allowed itself now to be seduced by greed

indicatoren_genade.indicator: Christ as the only capable Subject (I AM)
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: Only God can say I AM... Jesus picks it up again

indicatoren_genade.indicator: Human inability to achieve the goal
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: what we are out to do cannot be done

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures (Moses, Early Church) are used as witnesses to Christ's identity rather than models for the hearer's behavior.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the pressure of self-actualization and 'junk' diets.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Justification is by receiving the 'Bread' rather than baking it.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from physical hunger to spiritual longing to Christological identity is well-integrated.
spanning_punten: The critique of 'health-and-wealth' preachers introduces a brief shift to a Devoir (Must) modality that slightly disrupts the flow of Grace.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Feeding upon that diet... our eternal health is certain.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The sermon focuses on the Son's provision rather than the Spirit's application.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is seen as 'insufficiency' and 'maimed nature'—a hunger that leads to destructive substitutions.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully positions Christ as the Subject of the 'I AM' and the 'Bread', placing the hearer in the role of the Receiver. It avoids the trap of making the hearer the Subject of their own satisfaction.

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: The hearer might identify with the 'greedy American' as a Subject who must change themselves.
identificatie_herstel.voorgestelde_identificatie: The 'maimed' person who is fed by Christ.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Ensure the 'abridging of superfluities' is framed as a fruit of the Bread rather than a condition for it.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Increase Pouvoir (The Spirit's power to change)
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Explicitly mention how the 'Bread' provides the power to resist greed, not just the meaning of life.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Frame the 'junk diets' as a form of spiritual captivity (Cosmic Opponent).
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: To make the 'I AM' intervention more miraculous.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (Christ as Bread) clearly precedes and grounds the Ethics (Abridging superfluities).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A strong theocentric sermon that uses the 'I AM' structure to strip the hearer of self-sufficiency and offer Christ as the only source of ontological security.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis would focus on the 'opera' and 'Ted Koppel' anecdotes as ethos-builders, Greimas reveals these are actantial parables of human 'Pouvoir-faire' (ability) failing.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would focus on the 'I AM' in the Johannine context; Greimas shows how 'I AM' functions as the only valid Subject in the narrative engine.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas exposes that the sermon's power lies in the 'Subject-Switch' from the failing preacher/hearer to the eternal 'I AM'.

volledige_subject_lijst: Jesus (said, is, addresses, picks up, completes, gives, establishes)
We (hunger, substitute, feed, sell, prostitute, violate, fail, search, resort)
appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of using the 'Axis of Desire' to move the hearer from false objects to the True Object (Christ).
